name: Wizard Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner sorcerer with our Wizard Name Generator! Craft the perfect moniker worthy of Merlin himself. Because every wizard needs a name that's as magical as their spells.
introduction: Conjure up enchanting wizard names with our mystical generator. Whether you're writing a fantasy novel, creating a role-playing character, or just dreaming of wielding a wand, we've got the perfect name to ignite your imagination. Prepare to be spellbound!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A brand new wizardly name will appear before your very eyes.
Not feeling it? No worries! Click again, and again, and again... until you find the name that resonates with your magical soul.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to craft a truly unique and personalized wizard name.
Share your awesome wizard name with the world! (Or keep it a secret, like a powerful spell only you know.)

faqs.question: Is this generator really magical?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee actual magic, we've poured plenty of enchanted code into it. The results are pretty darn close!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our Wizard Name Generator is perfect for Dungeons & Dragons, fantasy novels, video games, or any other creative project that needs a touch of wizardry.

faqs.question: Are the names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! All generated names are free for you to use however you like. Go forth and create, young wizard!

faqs.question: Will this generator teach me actual spells?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But a great name is the first step to becoming a legendary wizard. The rest is up to you (and maybe a good spellbook).

faqs.question: I don't like any of the names. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that speaks to your inner wizard. Or try mixing and matching prefixes and suffixes for a truly unique result.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Contact us through our website and share your magical inspiration.
